info.desc: Make sure that you have the envelope the right way up, and have chosen the correct paper size.

page.title: Print envelopes
page.p: Most printers will allow you to print directly onto an envelope. This is especially useful if you have a lot of letters to send, for example.

section.title: કવરમાં છાપી રહ્યા છે
section.p: There are two things you need to check when trying to print onto an envelope.

The first is that your printer knows what size the envelope is. Press
Ctrl P
to open the Print dialog, go to the Page Setup tab and choose the Pap
